name: CubShoot (Belial)
description:
The Story

Ubz was born from a Unity bug after performing Ctrl+Z several times and causing the application to close.

Ubz gets trapped inside the FPS game that was being created and as a result of this, the game itself spawns enemies that will attack and chase him to the end.

Ubz's mission is to survive and escape from the game he is trapped in.

You can play this game with Keyboard and Mouse or with a Xbox One Controller.

Action

Control

Basic Movements

 

Camera Movement

 

Jump

 

Shoot

 

Kinesis Shoot
